content.rendered:
This 1938 vintage was bottled from four casks, distilled on the last day of the year and aged at the Macallan warehouses for 30 years before being transferred to the Gordon & MacPhail bonded warehouses in Elgin.

The casks were bottled at cask strength at 65 years old in December 2004.
This is the oldest Macallan ever bottled by Gordon & MacPhail.
Gordon & MacPhail

excerpt.rendered:
Bottle Size: 700ml
Alcohol Strength: 41.4%
Cask Type: Sherry
Age: 65 years old
